title: Sung Kyung-hwa
content:
Sung Kyung-Hwa (Korean: 성경화; born July 20, 1965), also spelled as Seong Gyeong-hwa, is a South Korean team handball player and Olympic champion.
She received a silver medal with the South Korean team at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles.[1] Her team won the gold medals at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul.[2]

This article about a South Korean Olympic medalist is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
